events.name: HTC Vive One Day VR Development Bootcamp
events.description:
HTC Vive, together with AsiaVR as the local(Singapore) partner is organising a VR Dev Bootcamp! We are inviting people who are making games, 360 videos, 3d artwork and any type of VR development to come and learn from VR experts about the technical side on VR development to tune up your skills and equip yourself with valuable knowledge. Best of all, its free like all AsiaVR events! So sign up now! Limited slots available! 


Tentative Agenda (will still be updated): 09:00am Registration  09:45am ~ 10:15am   Guest 1 10:00am ~ 10:15am   Guest 2 10:15am ~ 11:00am  NVIDIA VRWorks: Accelerating and Enhancing VR Experiences. By Delia Hou, nVidia  11:00am ~ 12:15pm   Unity best practices in VR / Introduction to Editor VR. By Yifei Boon, Unity3D  12:15pm ~ 13:00pm   Lunch  (Catering Provided) 13:00pm ~ 13:30pm   GPU-coding for custom animation and effects (with Live HTC Vive Coding Demo) By Martin Eklund. 13:30pm ~ 14:30pm   Achieving Presence in VR. By Joe McGinn, DigiPen Institute of Technology Singapore   14:30pm ~ 15:30pm   Asset Creation Process for Front Defense. By Ethan Tsao, Fantahorn Studio (HTC Vive)  15:30pm ~ 16:30pm   VR Game Development Experience Sharing. By Douglas Lee, Fantahorn Studio (HTC Vive)  16:30pm ~ 17:00pm   New Era of VR / Vive X, the Accelerator Program. By weiging, HTC Vive
events.location: LT4A at Digipen Institute of Technology Singapore, 510 Dover Road, SIT@SP Building
events.group_name: AsiaVR Association - Singapore Virtual Reality Meetup Group

events.name: Tessel Workshop
events.description:
The founders of the Tessel project Kelsey Bresemann and Jon McKay are in town to speak at JSConf.Asia (yay!) and are hosting this hands-on Tessel "Internet of Things" workshop for DevFest.Asia (double yay!). 

Kelsey and Jon will teach developers about the basics of hardware communication (GPIO, ADC, I2C, SPI, etc.), how to read datasheets, and how to start talking to sensors using JavaScript and Tessel 2. 

Curious? Drop by! :)

Find out more at https://tessel.io.

events.name: Coffee Meetup
events.description: Dear members, Let's meetup and chit chat about our phones/experiences.We can go to the Sony Store after that.Maybe dinner together after that at Ootoya/Somerset? We will meet near the tables at the Udon and Fish soup stall... Cheers,Tsubasa
events.location: Food Republic @ Wisma Atria, Orchard, 435 Orchard Road, 238877, Singapore
